description:
I’m a Mechatronics Engineer and Game Programmer with hands-on experience in building interactive and scalable applications using Unity, .NET, and modern web technologies.


My work spans VR/AR development, full-stack web applications, and backend systems using C#, Entity Framework, and Azure.

Over the past few years, I’ve developed XR training tools, microservices-based platforms, and web applications using Clean Architecture, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. I’m also experienced with React, Angular, and Blazor WebAssembly, allowing me to deliver seamless cross-platform solutions.


I hold a Game Programming diploma (High Honors) from Centennial College and a Bachelor's in Mechatronics Engineering, where my final project was featured in an IEEE publication. I’m passionate about creating clean, maintainable code and solving real-world problems through technology.
